ygData.subject: RE: What have people seen change with the patch?
ygData.msgSnippet: Changes... all for the worse IMO My box of Akubar s a piece of crap now, it used to reduce weight to 0 and now it reduces weight by 20% (ooooh what a great
ygData.messageBody:
Changes... all for the worse IMO

My box of Akubar's a piece of crap now, it used to reduce weight to 0 and
now it reduces weight by 20% (ooooh what a great item for such a rare drop!)

Mino Bracers, i asked a ranger what he had on as bracers last night, he
shows it to me, nice item, 10 str buff and some resists as well, oops doh
crap, he cant re-equip it as slam bam thank you ma'am its now warrior only.

Selo's as others mentioned got nerfed

Crafted bracers used to sell for 115pp to vendors and now for only 9pp

I dunno what else has changed, but all in all i found last night quite
depressing

Minkin
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [SMTP:GGillan@...]
> Sent: September 14, 1999 11:53 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] What have people seen change with the patch?
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Apparently there's been a lot of unannounced changes with the last patch.
> Just wondering what new things people have seen/noticed. I'm not looking
> to
> hear complaints about this being nerfed and that being ruined. Just
> wondering what funky new stuff people have seen like Shadow Men, mushrooms
> and cabbages. Also any changes that we, as bards should watch out for.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 39 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
